front.title: Definitions of Textual Conventions (TCs) for Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) Management

abstract.t: This draft defines a Management Information Base (MIB) module whichcontains Textual Conventions to represent commonly used BidirectionalForwarding Detection (BFD) management information. The intent isthat these TEXTUAL CONVENTIONS (TCs) will be imported and used in BFDrelated MIB modules that would otherwise define their ownrepresentations.
